ComicInfo.Summary: Critically acclaimed cult horror hit HACK/SLASH comes to IMAGE COMICS in a new mini series that explores CASSIE'S first case! Cassie travels to small town Iowa to investigate an abandoned farm where murdered teens keep turning up in a corn field. But trying to go "undercover" at a new school may prove a greater challenge than any slasher for a girl who can't fit in.
